description: Classic Italian biscuits with a deep flavour of almond.
name: Amaretti Christmas Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium egg, you only need the egg white

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. In a mixing bowl, whisk the egg white until it starts to from peaks.
Slowly add the caster sugar and keep mixing until it forms peaks again.
Add the rest of the ingredients apart from the icing sugar until fully combined.
Now divide the mix into about 10 small balls and set to one side to set for 20 minutes.
Put the icing sugar in a bowl and cover the balls in icing heavily before placing on baking paper on a baking tray.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes or until the biscuits start to brown or crack.
